import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import DialogTitle from '@material-ui/core/DialogTitle'; import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog'; import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions'; import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent'; import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField' import './itemDialog.css' import picture from './imgs/carPhoto.jpg' export default function ItemDialog ({handleCloseDialog, open, openedItem}){ const [car, setCar] = useState({ brand: "", model: "", price: "", year: "" }) return(

{openedItem.brand} {openedItem.model}

{openedItem.price}

Year

{openedItem.year}

Mileage

250.000
 ) }
